items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Broadcasting
items.content_text:
### Podcasting

*   [AntennaPod (⭐7.1k)](https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod) - A podcast manager for Android ([antennapod.org](https://antennapod.org/)).
*   [Anytime Podcast Player (⭐520)](https://github.com/amugofjava/anytime_podcast_player) - Free and easy to use podcast player for Android and iOS ([anytimeplayer.app](https://anytimeplayer.app/)).
*   [Castopod (⭐732)](https://github.com/ad-aures/castopod) - Podcast Hosting and Broadcasting ([castopod.org](https://castopod.org/)).
*   [gPodder (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/gpodder/gpodder) - Media aggregator and podcast client ([gpodder.org](https://gpodder.org/)).
*   [Podlove Publisher (⭐302)](https://github.com/podlove/podlove-publisher) - Podcast Publisher for WordPress ([podlove.org](https://podlove.org/podlove-podcast-publisher)).
*   [Podlove Web Player (⭐88)](https://github.com/podlove/podlove-ui) - Podcast-optimized, HTML5-based video and audio player ([podlove.org](https://podlove.org/podlove-web-player)).

### Streaming

*   [PeerTube (⭐14k)](https://github.com/Chocobozzz/PeerTube) - ActivityPub-federated video streaming platform using P2P directly in your web browser. (<https://joinpeertube.org/>)
items.content_html:
Podcasting

  • AntennaPod (⭐7.1k) - A podcast manager for Android (antennapod.org).
  • Anytime Podcast Player (⭐520) - Free and easy to use podcast player for Android and iOS (anytimeplayer.app).
  • Castopod (⭐732) - Podcast Hosting and Broadcasting (castopod.org).
  • gPodder (⭐1.4k) - Media aggregator and podcast client (gpodder.org).
  • Podlove Publisher (⭐302) - Podcast Publisher for WordPress (podlove.org).
  • Podlove Web Player (⭐88) - Podcast-optimized, HTML5-based video and audio player (podlove.org).

Streaming

  • PeerTube (⭐14k) - ActivityPub-federated video streaming platform using P2P directly in your web browser. (https://joinpeertube.org/)

items.title: Awesome Ddd
items.content_text:
### Libraries and Frameworks / .NET

*   [Deveel Repository (⭐3)](https://github.com/deveel/deveel.repository) - A simple implementation of the Repository pattern for .NET, supporting MongoDB and Entity Framework, extending the model with further utilities (caching, paging, validation, etc.).
items.content_html:
Libraries and Frameworks / .NET

  • Deveel Repository (⭐3) - A simple implementation of the Repository pattern for .NET, supporting MongoDB and Entity Framework, extending the model with further utilities (caching, paging, validation, etc.).

items.title: Awesome Yew
items.content_text:
### Projects

*   [konnektoren.help](https://github.com/Konnektoren/konnektoren-web-game) - An interactive web application for learning German grammar, featuring gamified challenges and a map-based interface. [Web App](https://konnektoren.help)

items.title: Awesome Flutter
items.content_text:
### UI / Libraries

*   [Forui (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/forus-labs/forui) <!--stargazers:forus-labs/forui--> - Minimalistic UI library heavily inspired by shadcn/ui by [Forus Labs](https://github.com/forus-labs).
*   [Shadcn (⭐2k)](https://github.com/nank1ro/flutter-shadcn-ui) <!--stargazers:nank1ro/flutter-shadcn-ui--> - Shadcn-ui port. Fully customizable UI components.
items.content_html:
UI / Libraries

  • Forui (⭐1.2k) - Minimalistic UI library heavily inspired by shadcn/ui by Forus Labs.
  • Shadcn (⭐2k) - Shadcn-ui port. Fully customizable UI components.

items.title: Awesome Machine Learning
items.content_text:
### Python / Speech Recognition

*   [EspNet (⭐9.3k)](https://github.com/espnet/espnet) - ESPnet is an end-to-end speech processing toolkit for tasks like speech recognition, translation, and enhancement, using PyTorch and Kaldi-style data processing.
items.content_html:
Python / Speech Recognition

  • EspNet (⭐9.3k) - ESPnet is an end-to-end speech processing toolkit for tasks like speech recognition, translation, and enhancement, using PyTorch and Kaldi-style data processing.
